duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform engineering assignments and provide technical direction to colleagues.
Analyze parts and assemblies to determine solutions and implement cost-effective measures.
Perform calculations and issue reports, work cross-functionally on assignments.
Provide engineering support for production, remanufacturing, and aftermarket.
Complete other engineering duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Must be enrolled and pursuing a degree in Mechanical Engineering or related program at an accredited school and have completed 30 semester hours of undergraduate studies.
